labels.name: epic
labels.value: TC_55!048 | Applied filters 'Region/Sectors' are not displayed after selecting an item from the 'Most traded' dropdown in the 'Live shares prices'  widget on the 'Shares' page

items.statusDetails:
Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Canada', 'Grande-Bretagne', "L'Irlande", 'Technologie', 'Utilitaires'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Canada', 'Grande-Bretagne', "L'Irlande", 'Utilitaires']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Grande-Bretagne', 'Japon', "États-Unis d'Amérique", 'Matériaux de base', 'Utilitaires'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Grande-Bretagne', 'Japon', "États-Unis d'Amérique"]
Failed: Bug № ??? 'Markets' menu not present for 'fr' language

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Australie', 'Grande-Bretagne', 'Suède', 'Matériaux de base', 'Santé'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: []

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Hong Kong', 'Italie', 'Suède', 'Matériaux de base', 'Énergie'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Hong Kong', 'Italie', 'Suède', 'Matériaux de base']
